name: Save Our Ship!
description:
Save Our Ship is an "indie" game created and continuously developed in Scratch.

You play as a boat that goes through the dangerous waters.

You collect treasure and crates for points. You need 1500 points to win the game.

However, there are enemies and obstacles. There are rocks that block your way and sharks that swim through the water with their only goal in life to take down your boat.

Updates and bugfixes happen occasionally, so keep an eye out!

Also, if you have any suggestions, maybe consider telling me! I would like to hear what y'all would like to see in the game.

IMPORTANT: This Scratch project was exported using the TurboWarp Packager. Because it's, well, a Scratch game, it's weird and because it auto-starts you have to interact with the game first so sound can work. The game may be buggy at time and if you detect any bugs please don't hesitate to tell me!
